description: This app displays random quotes each time the button is clicked. The background color changes as the quotes change, and the quotes change every few seconds if the button is not clicked.
Adds a search feature and pagination links to a webpage, allowing users to only see 10 students at a time.

Used jQuery library to enhance the registration form for a fictional conference. Added customized and conditional behavior and interactivity and provided error messages when the user enters invalid information into the form fields.
A browser-based word guessing game created using JavaScript and Object-Oriented Programming.

Using the Random User Generator API (https://randomuser.me/), the code requests information from the API such as name, pictures and address and diplays them on the page. When an employee card is clicked, a pop up window opens up displaying more details about the employee.
